Application Deadline : 07 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: At most 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Experience: 3 to 5 years Published: 23 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor/Honors Bachelor’s degree in Business, Supply Chain, Logistics, or a related field. Experience 3 to 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Freight forwarding, Shipping Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years 3–5 years of experience in freight forwarding documentation (air/sea export/import), with at least 1–2 years in a supervisory or senior executive role. Strong understanding of Incoterms, international shipping procedures, and customs rules. Excellent communication, coordination, and problem-solving skills.. Proficiency in MS Office and logistics software. Ability to manage multiple tasks and work under tight deadlines. Responsibilities & Context Department: Documentation Industry: Freight Forwarding & Logistics About the Role We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Sr. Executive / Assistant Manager for our documentation operations. The ideal candidate will have strong knowledge of export/import procedures, excellent coordination skills and the ability to manage a team while ensuring accuracy and compliance in all export/import documentation processes. Key Responsibilities Prepare, verify, and process all shipping and customs documents including invoices, packing lists, HBL/MBL, AWB, EGM, and other trade documents. Supervise daily documentation activities for air and ocean freight shipments (export and import). Ensure timely submission of shipping instructions to carriers and handling agents, including requisition for payment & intime telex /release of BL. Communicate with overseas agent for Pre-Alert & other documentation related issues for intime and smooth delivery. Ensure Just in time data transmit of VGM, EGM, AMS, ISF with concern parties. Follow-up with customers, carriers, customs brokers, and internal departments to ensure smooth cargo movement. Maintain proper documentation files and ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements. Cross-check documents and prepare master log to avoid discrepancies that may delay cargo. Maintain communication regarding shipment status and deliver required documentation on time. Support audits by maintaining accurate, organized records of all documentation. Skills & Expertise Fluent in English Speaking Knowledge of office management systems and procedures MS Office and En Suggested by Supply Chain Management Documentation Expo

Assistant Officer, SME Monitoring and Collections Application Deadline : 09 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Published: 23 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Experience Requirements A minimum of 2 years of relevant working experience (preferably in collection/recovery/SME finance) in Banks/Non-Bank Financial Institutions Additional Requirements Ability to ride a motorcycle (preferred) Strong interpersonal, negotiation, and communication skills Target-driven and field-oriented mindset Responsibilities & Context Division : SME Financial Services Department : SME Monitoring and Collections Employment Type: Full-Time (FTE) Position Overview We are seeking dynamic and result-oriented professionals for the position of Assistant Officer in our SME Monitoring and Collections Department. The role is primarily responsible for Non-Performing Loan (NPL) recovery, client follow-up, and legal coordination to ensure effective collection performance. Key Responsibilities Achieve monthly NPL collection targets Conduct physical visits to clients, guarantors, and relatives at permanent addresses Maintain regular communication with legal representatives for case monitoring Coordinate with law enforcement agencies for warrant execution Ensure daily collection follow-up and reporting Facilitate closing of NPL accounts Maintain strong professional relationships with clients and colleagues Skills & Expertise Banks & Financial Credit Collection Credit Control And Recovery General Banking SME Banking Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Company Information LankaBangla Finance PLC. Follow More jobs from this company Address: Safura Tower, Level 11, 20 Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Banani 1213, Dhaka Business: LankaBangla Finance PLC. is the fastest growing Non Bank financial institution in Bangladesh operating its business through 27 branches across the country. LankaBangla Finance has set new benchmark by showing outstanding business growth for the last 5 years in all of its operational areas of Corporate, Retail, CMSME Business. LankaBangla Finance has also got strong presence in the capital market through its subsidiaries-LankaBangla Securities, LankaBangla Investments and LankaBangla Asset Management Company. It has a well defined corporate governance and as a testimony to that, LankaBangla Finance won South Asian Federation of Accountants (SAFA) Award for Best Presented Annual Report in 2014 - 2018, SAFA- an apex body of SAARC. LankaBangla Finance also achieved ISO/IEC 27001:2013 and PCI DSS Certification in 2020 and 2021 respectively. Report this

Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) with strong communication skills. Responsibilities & Context Assist in deciding and optimizing the overall Supply Chain (logistics and distribution) network and awarding the business to competitive service providers for all distribution points for total distribution of finished goods as per supervision. Evaluate various logistics and distribution value enhancement projects (3PL & 4PL) and ensure the projects are implemented as per the agreed time schedule to deliver the expected benefits and meet the business development plans guided by the supervisor. Help out in the selection and development of the carriers (3rd party and company owned) for efficient and safe transportation. Develop & maintain relations with company transport providers & 3rd party transport agencies to take all necessary steps for ensuring safe & timely delivery of consignment. Ensure controls and procedures are in place for efficient and correct stock deployment across the entire value chain to ensure optimum distribution cost and freshness index and maintain the desirable service levels for all customers. Support in analyzing logistical problems and developing new solutions for both distributor & depot operation to increase business growth and cost-effective operation. Work closely with other supply chain units to ensure effective delivery management to ensure a competitive advantage. Make a liaison with the production line for stock availability and take necessary steps if a crisis period of short stock occurs and make sure that all dispatched programs must be aligned with stock available at that time period. Coordinate with respective departmental concerns to collect information about the delivery program. Prepare a delivery plan in SAP, prepare necessary reporting and SKU-wise delivery programs using related SAP modules. Prepare necessary logistical reports related to distribution logistics as guided by the supervisor. Ensure accuracy and integrity in day-to-day tasks that will have been assigned by the reporting manager/supervisor based on job scope. Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor of Real Estate (BRE) Bachelor/Honors Experience 1 to 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Real Estate Startup Additional Requirements Age 25 to 50 years Responsibilities & Context আমাদের ল্যান্ড শেয়ারিং, জমি বিক্রয় এবং রেন্টাল প্রজেক্টগুলোর জন্য আমরা এমন কিছু দক্ষ 'এক্সিকিউটিভ / সিনিয়র এক্সিকিউটিভ - সেলস এন্ড মার্কেটিং' খুঁজছি যারা শুধু চাকরি করতে নয়, বরং চ্যালেঞ্জ জয় করতে ভালোবাসেন।আপনি কি চ্যালেঞ্জ নিতে ভালোবাসেন? আপনি কি প্রতি মাসে নির্ধারিত টার্গেট পূরণ করে নিজেকে প্রমাণ করতে প্রস্তুত? আপনি যদি স্মার্টলি কথা বলতে পারেন এবং মানুষের সাথে দ্রুত সুসম্পর্ক গড়ে তুলে সেলস ক্লোজ করতে দক্ষ হন, তবে আমরা আপনার জন্যই অপেক্ষা করছি। আপনার মূল কাজ কী হবে? রিয়েল এস্টেটে সেলস মানেই হচ্ছে টার্গেট। আপনাকে মাসিক ভিত্তিতে ল্যান্ড শেয়ার এবং জমি বিক্রয়ের লক্ষ্যমাত্রা (Target) দেওয়া হবে যা অবশ্যই পূরণ করতে হবে। এর পাশাপাশি: টেলি-সেলস: কাস্টমার ডাটাবেস থেকে সম্ভাব্য ক্রেতাদের ফোন করে প্রজেক্ট সম্পর্কে জানানো। ভিজিট নিশ্চিত করা: ক্রেতাকে মানসিকভাবে প্রস্তুত করে অফিসে বা প্রজেক্ট সাইটে নিয়ে আসা। নেগোসিয়েশন: ক্রেতার বাজেট ও পছন্দ বুঝে জমি বা ল্যান্ড শেয়ারিং প্রজেক্টের জটিলতাগুলো কাস্টমারকে পানির মতো সহজ করে বুঝিয়ে বলার ক্ষমতা থাকতে হবে। সেলস ক্লোজিং: শুধু ফোন করা বা কাস্টমারকে বুঝানো নয়, কাস্টমারের সাইকোলজি বুঝে তাকে চূড়ান্ত ক্রয়ের সিদ্ধান্তে নিয়ে আসাই হবে আপনার প্রধান সার্থকতা। রিলেশনশিপ: ক্রেতাদের সাথে দীর্ঘমেয়াদী সুসম্পর্ক রাখা যাতে ভবিষ্যতে রেফারেল সেলস আসে। রিপোর্টিং: প্রতিদিনের কাজের আপডেট এবং কাস্টমার ফলো-আপ আমাদের সিস্টেমে (CRM) ইনপুট দেওয়া। Skills & Expertise Client Acquisition Client Handling Client Service/ Marketing Direct Sales lead generation Real Estate Marketing Real Estate Sales sales closing Sales target Customer Service Target Achievement Suggested by Sales & Marketing Strategic Planning Sales target Customer Service Compensation & Other Benefits T/A,Mobile bill,Performance bonus Festival Bonus: 2 Target-Based High Incentives: আকর্ষণীয় মূল বেতনের পাশাপাশি প্রতিটি সেলস ক্লোজিং এবং টার্গেট পূরণের ওপর আনলিমিটেড ইনসেন্টিভ উপার্জনের সুযোগ। Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Job Highlights ল্যান্ড শেয়ারিং ও জমি বিক্রয়ে ২-৫ বছরের অভিজ্ঞতা সম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার। আকর্ষণীয় মূল বেতনের পাশাপাশি সেলস টার্গেট পূরণে আনলিমিটেড ইনসেন্টিভ। যাতায়াত ও মোবাইল বিল সুবিধাসহ পারফরম্যান্সের ভিত্তিতে দ্রুত ক্যারিয়ার গ্রোথ। Read Before Apply আপনার প্রয়োজনীয় যেকোনো ত

Electrical Engineer – Maintenance : Group QA Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Group QA Electrical Engineer – Maintenance Application Deadline : 25 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 03 Location: Mymensingh (Bhaluka) Salary: Negotiable Published: 23 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Technical Skills: Deep knowledge of industrial electrical panels, motors, VFDs, PLC troubleshooting, and HT/LT switchgear. Utility Knowledge: Proven experience with boiler controls, generators, etc. Competencies: Strong problem-solving skills, ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and familiarity with safety standards (e.g., NFPA, OSHA, etc.). ISO: Capable of implementing ISO 14001:2015 & ISO 9001:2015 guidelines within the plant and handling relevant ISO audits and other regulatory inspections. Responsibilities & Context Position Summary: The Electrical Engineer will oversee the complete electrical integrity and performance of the company’s state-of-the-art pesticide formulation, packaging, and repackaging facility, ensuring reliable and efficient plant operations end to end. This includes ensuring maximum uptime of production machinery through proactive preventive maintenance (PM) and scheduled maintenance, as well as the robust operation of utility & other equipment and machinery (i.e. Generator, Boiler, ETP, WTP, Incinerator, production machinery,HVAC etc.). The role requires a strong focus on uninterrupted production management, safety, compliance & energy efficiency. Key Responsibilities 1. Machinery & Production Line Maintenance (Electrical Aspects): Perform scheduled preventive maintenance (PM) and troubleshooting for all formulation machinery (mixers, agitators, emulsifiers) and repacking equipment (filling machines, capping machines, labeling machines, conveyor systems). Maintain and troubleshoot PLCs, Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), HMI panels, and SCADA systems. Troubleshoot electrical malfunctions, including motor starters, DOL starters, Star-Delta starters, and sensors. Manage electrical safety in operation and maintenance, deploying Lockout/Tagout (LOTO) and adhering to safety protocols. 2. Utility & Other Equipment Maintenance: Boilers: Maintenance of electrical control systems for industrial boilers (steam generation). Generator (DG Set): Maintenance of backup generators, including ATS panels, synchronization, and fuel system electricals. Incinerator: Maintenance of electrical systems for waste disposal incinerators, including burner controls and monitoring sensors.
